aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center Establishment
Amazon announced the establishment of the Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center is a groundbreaking initiative.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center elevates data protection to unprecedented levels within the technology industry.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center elevates security operations to unprecedented levels within the technology industry.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center operates under direct board oversight.
Amazon has a Security Committee.
Amazon expanded its Security Committee.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center operates through Amazon's expanded Security Committee.
The establishment demonstrates Amazon's commitment to making cybersecurity a core business priority.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center brings together over 2,000 cybersecurity professionals from around the world.
The cybersecurity professionals include former government security officials.
The cybersecurity professionals include ethical hackers.
The cybersecurity professionals include AI security researchers.
Dr. Elena Vasquez is the Chief Security Officer at Amazon.
Dr. Elena Vasquez leads the Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center operates from secure facilities in Virginia.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center operates from secure facilities in Dublin.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center operates from secure facilities in Singapore.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center provides 24/7 global threat monitoring capabilities.
The Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center provides 24/7 global threat response capabilities.
Dr. Elena Vasquez said "Cybersecurity is not just about protecting data – it's about preserving trust in the digital economy."
Dr. Elena Vasquez made this statement during the center's inaugural presentation to the Amazon Board of Directors.
Dr. Elena Vasquez said "Our Excellence Center represents a new paradigm where security considerations are embedded in every business decision, from product development to customer service."

metadata.header_path: /Amazon Establishes Global Cybersecurity Excellence Center with Board-Level Oversight/
/Amazon Establishes Global Cybersecurity Excellence Center with Board-Level Oversight/

text:
## News Report

Amazon today announced the establishment of the Amazon Cybersecurity Excellence Center, a groundbreaking initiative that elevates data protection and security operations to unprecedented levels within the technology industry. The center operates under direct board oversight through Amazon's newly expanded Security Committee, demonstrating the company's commitment to making cybersecurity a core business priority.

The Excellence Center brings together over 2,000 cybersecurity professionals from around the world, including former government security officials, ethical hackers, and AI security researchers. Led by Chief Security Officer Dr. Elena Vasquez, the center operates from secure facilities in Virginia, Dublin, and Singapore, providing 24/7 global threat monitoring and response capabilities.

"Cybersecurity is not just about protecting data – it's about preserving trust in the digital economy," said Dr. Vasquez during the center's inaugural presentation to the Amazon Board of Directors. "Our Excellence Center represents a new paradigm where security considerations are embedded in every business decision, from product development to customer service."
